    Talks

    In the last two years I have been publishing each of my talks to Github. Since I started using reveal.js for the presentation framework, it has made it easier to publish my presentations online, using Github by default.

    Over time I will find older talks and publish here as well, but or now you will only find my talks from after 2012.

    • Engie Workshop Paris, France, April 2018 - API Trends

    • Red Hat - Transforming Government IT with Containers, API’s and Integration
